name: Roast Chicken
ingredients: Desired seasonings (e.g., garlic powder, salt, pepper, seasoning salt)
utensils: Shallow roasting pan or large baking pan

instructions.en: Clean the inside of the chicken well (for whole chicken).
Season inside and out with desired seasonings.
Place in a shallow roasting pan.

Roast according to size: 2-2.5 lbs at 400º for 1-1.25 hours; 2.5-3 lbs at 375º for 1.25-1.75 hours; 3-4 lbs at 375º for 1.75-2.25 hours; 5-8 lbs at 325º for 2.5-3.5 hours. For thighs, roast at 425º for 35-45 minutes.

notes: Cooking times vary based on chicken size. For chicken thighs, ensure they are placed skin side up in the pan. Roast until juices run clear.
